channel.title: ClashX ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
• Version 1.1
  • Support icon in dark mode
  • Remember proxy group select
  • Fix traffic status update delay
  • Version 1.0
  • If you have installed previous version. you may need to delete config file in ~/.config/clash/config.ini and regenerate it
  • Support select group
  • Support urlTest group
  • Support outbound mode
